wikipedia_page.main: Patrick Sibley Jan Derham  (born 23 August 1959) is a history teacher who served as Headmaster of Westminster School from 2014 to 2020.

response: * Patrick Derham, headmaster of Westminster School
*Patrick Derham OBE (born 1959), Headmaster of Westminster School

The poet Kate Clanchy writing in The Guardian, described the book as "aloof considerations of educational issues" while Patrick Derham, headmaster of the private Westminster School, saw the book as a "missed opportunity" that "falls short of a full account of the story of social mobility". Anne McElvoy wrote that the book "reminds us that many arguments recur down the decades".
